void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y;                       // normalized coordinates 
 // U *= mat2(cos(.3*iTime+vec4(0,11,33,0))) / exp2(.3*iTime);   // optional rotation + zoom
    float y = length(U),        a = atan(U.y,U.x), n = 48./6.28, // polar coords
          L = round(log(y)*8.), A = round(a*n),        // (L,A) : disc id
          l = exp(L/8.);                               // (l,A/n): disc pos (polar)
    mod(A-L, 2.) < 1. ?  l += l/60. : l;               // offset 1 disc /2 to suggest spiral
    U = U/l - cos( A/n - vec2(0,1.57));                // disc local coords
    y = y/l - 1.;                                      // local radial coord
    mod(A-L, 4.) < 2. ? y = -y : y;                    // disc gradient direction
    l = 60.*length(U) - 2.5;                           // disc SDF
    O = vec4( mix( .5, fract(60.*y/5.5+.5), smoothstep( 1., -1., l/fwidth(l) ) )); // draw disc 
}
renderpass.name: Image
